code_value: Questions 1~2  You are going to have a job interview. Ask one of your friends who has the same job two questions about it.</br>Questions 3~4   Your friend has got an offer to a university in France. Ask him two questions about this.
Questions 1~2  You are going to have a job interview. Ask one of your friends who has the same job two questions about it.
Questions 3~4   Your friend has got an offer to a university in France. Ask him two questions about this.
